reviews.review: Its a fun game, but it unbalanced, community is very toxic and matchmaking is awful. Somtimes you will matchmake with the top 1 rank players, other times you will matchmake with newcommers, this issue has been like this for 2 years, they are trying a new matchmaking system now that is based around MMR. We will see if it helps. One last thing to mention, before when you qued up as a killer you had to wait in lobby 20 min for a 5-10 min game. This looks like it has changed, and that the que is somewhat shorter maybe 5-8 min, this is stil very wierd because the game has over 30 000 players at all times. Devs needs to fix the matchmaking system. In conclusion if you like a horror game yeah go for it, its fun, but if you are looking for a competetiv gameplay, balanced or good rankingsystem then skip this one. Overall just skip it.
this game has a few bugs but its appsolutly amazing to play

Pretty fun game and has some fun moments, even better with Friends!

This is one of the few games of its kind, and although it always has a new problem going on, there's a lot of fun to be had here. Especially if you take it seriously and get addicted to your own adrenaline.
Very fun to watch fictional characters die. Neat.

Dead by daylight is a fantastic game. At it's surface, it's an adrenaline-pumping horror game that strikes fear into the hearts of the survivors and grants much satisfaction to the killer to take down the survivors and send them to the entity, though at it's highest level of play is a game like chess, a constant mindgame between the survivors and the killer. From loops to coordinating gens, every aspect of the game is a mindgame. It's an extremely fun and competitive game while maintaining it's roots of a very thrilling horror game.

Ich werd nie vergessen, wie ich das Spiel das erste Mal gespielt hab! Es war mein erstes auch nur ann√§hernd gruseliges Spiel. Meine beste Freundin und ich haben uns anfangs in erster Linie irgendwo im Eck versteckt^^ und dann kam der Killer in die N√§he und wir h√∂rten einen Herzschlag und sind direkt in Panik verfallen und wie Karnickel auf Speed durch die Gegend gerannt:-) das war lustig! 
Dieser kleine Thrill ist jetzt zwar verflogen, doch das Spiel √ºberrascht noch immer gern mit dem ein oder anderen Jumpscare (vorallem mit Michael Myers und Ghostface) und vielen lustigen Situationen. 
Manchmal kann es super frustrierend sein, denn die Killer sind teilweise ganz sch√∂n overpowert. 
Aber: neue Runde neues Gl√ºck ;-)
Man kann Dead by Daylight wunderbar mit Freunden spielen.
Au√üerdem ist es perfekt f√ºr zwischendurch, da eine Rund ca 20 Minuten geht und man danach auch gut wieder aufh√∂ren kann zu spielen, ohne den Faden einer Story zu verlieren oder so.

Impossibile da giocare in serenit√†. Le parti sono sbilanciate a seconda dei perk e degli add-on ridicoli, bugs che sono presenti dall'uscita del gioco. Non √® possibie finire un game senza lag dovuto alla connessione dell'host  o alle lobby. Insomma, ti tiene impegnato un paio di mesi al massimo  se sei fortunato poi ti stufi delle solite situazioni tra cui: face-camping, gen-rushing, giocatori che, nonostante abbiano vinto, si dilettano ad insultarti per motivi che non stanno n√© in cielo n√© in terra e, al 90% delle volte, compagni di squadra che non ti aiutano o peggio, ti impediscono di giocare come si deve perch√® collaborano con il killer.  Senza contare l'inutilit√† del ranking system che non provoca altro che fastidio visto che i quitters lo fanno sempre scendere e ti fanno perdere tempo.
Uno dei peggiori acquisti che si possa fare se ci si aspetta un gioco horror decente. Se invece siete fans dei videogiochi basati sul farming o sul trolling, allora questo articolo fa per voi.
Un vero peccato visto che il concept √® originale e il sistema di gioco sia godibile (purtroppo quest'ultimo viene reso inutile dai problemi elencati in precedenza).

p.s. I devs dovrebbero pensare a risolvere i problemi attuali del gioco e non ad aggiungere nuovi contenuti pieni di bug.

Ce jeu est simple, et quand on sait vraiment jouer on peut r√©aliser des choses superbes.
